Some companies allow download free of their software for a particular period. This is mostly when the software is newly launched in the market. This is an efficient publicity and marketing strategy. The basic difference between an antivirus and firewall software programs is that antivirus software eliminates the viruses and threats and repairs your laptop or computer while firewall software altogether disallows the threats and viruses to enter your system. You can buy this highly advanced software systems from the market. However, if somebody keen in spending money on it and want to consider downloading most of the free versions then you can easily do so. There are plenty of websites available that provide free software download. These are most of the basic ones. Nevertheless, you can easily upgrade them by having to pay affordable prices.
